verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing a song of celebration
Lift up a shout of praise
For the bridegroom will come
The glorious one
And Oh - we will look on His face
We'll go to a much better place

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dance with all your might,
Lift up your hands and clap for joy
For the time's drawing near
When He will appeart
And Oh - we will stand by His side
A strong and pure spotless bride

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And we will dance on the streets that are golden
The glorious bride and the great Son of Man
From every tongue and tribe and nation
We will join, in the song of the Lamb

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Sing aloud for the time of rejoicing is near
Sisters: (Sing aloud for he time of rejoicing is near)
The risen King our groom is soon to appear
Sisters: (The risen King our groom is soon to appear
The wedding feast to come is now here at last
Sisters: (The wedding feast to come is now here at last)
Lift up your voice proclaim the coming One
